Dear Harry:
Jhe arrival tN^s^/eek of the August Newsletter reminded as
that I had neglected to answer your letter of June 2lith regarding the
elimination of "gratis** distribution of the publication*
I confess that I had not realised that I was receiving the
publication on a charity basis* Judging from conversations at some
of the conventions as the various organisational setups were discussed,
I assumed that I received it rightfully*
Will you send me information on fees for the associate memberÂ¬
ship mentioned in your letter as well as the necessary application
blanks* Although it is true that we have a construction permit from
the FCC, I do not know when we will have a station* I presume that the
associate membership may be best until the station situation is clarified
When I have such information about fees and application blanks for the
associate membership, I can review the situation with the Chairman of
the Broadcasting Committee, Mr. Arthur Brandon*
Sincerely,
ORGi>
